FuncDef:
The ecdh group command configures elliptic curve parameter values for the ECDHE algorithm.
The undo ecdh group command restores the default values of the elliptic curve parameters for the ECDHE algorithm. The ecdh group command configures elliptic curve parameter values for the ECDHE algorithm. The undo ecdh group command restores the default values of the elliptic curve parameters for the ECDHE algorithm. By default, the default elliptic curve parameter values of the ECDHE algorithm are Curve and Brainpool.
CLIs: ecdh group { nist | curve | brainpool | pqc-kyber }

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the elliptic curve parameter value to Nist.
-

Sets the elliptic curve parameter value to Curve.
-

Sets the elliptic curve parameter value to Brainpool.
-

Sets the key exchange algorithm to post-quantum hybrid key algorithm.  Currently, the post-quantum cryptographic algorithm complies with the draft-ietf-tls-hybrid-design-05 draft.
-

Examples: [*HUAWEI-ssl-policy-a] ecdh group nist curve brainpool pqc-kyber
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to modify the elliptic curve parameter settings of the ECDHE algorithm.
